originalText.text: Great service. I was a little nervous using them for the first time, because I needed a 2:30 AM pickup to go from my hotel in Manhattan to LaGuardia airport. The driver was right on time (actually, about 30 minutes early), and there was good communication by text when he was on his way and when he had arrived at the hotel.  The ride to LGA was nice, and he took us right to the terminal. I will definitely use Dial 7 next time I’m in the city. Thank you.

originalText.text: I really liked them. They were on time and took me to airport. The driver was very nice and friendly. I like my rides silent and i really appreciated that. Will definitely use again in the future.

text.text: I really liked them. They were on time and took me to airport. The driver was very nice and friendly. I like my rides silent and i really appreciated that. Will definitely use again in the future.

originalText.text: We used Dial 7 for the last 3 visits to New York (both too and from airport) and I cannot fault them! The cars arrive quickly/on time and are clean and the drivers are courteous. You are kept up to date via email/text message on arrival times etc and all fares are calculated beforehand (so no nasty surprises!). I would definitely recommend this company and will use again in the future.

text.text: We used Dial 7 for the last 3 visits to New York (both too and from airport) and I cannot fault them! The cars arrive quickly/on time and are clean and the drivers are courteous. You are kept up to date via email/text message on arrival times etc and all fares are calculated beforehand (so no nasty surprises!). I would definitely recommend this company and will use again in the future.

originalText.text: For years, I have depended on Dial 7 for excellent car service in NYC. The drivers are always professional yet friendly, and it's always a pleasure to ride with them. The Dial 7 mobile app works fine, but the phone call center for customer service is also great if you need to talk to a live person for any reason after making arrangements online - everyone is knowledgeable and nice. Basically, they do everything well and have been doing so for many years. I use other services in other cities, but for me, when in NYC, it's always Dial 7.

originalText.text: I've been using Dial 7 Car Service for some years now and all I have is wonderful things to say about them. The office and drivers are professonal and courteous, the drivers are consistently on tiime, and the cars are clean and comfortable. They are a bit pricey, but worth it not to have to try and hail a cab, and know you'll get to your destination on time, especially in rainy weather.
